extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

        public double calculateDamage(Creature defender,
                              Attack a)
        Parameters:

        a - - attack that hits
        Returns:

      • ManaCheck

        public boolean ManaCheck(Attack a)
        Checks if the player has the sufficient mana to cast Spell.
        Parameters:
        a - Attack to check against
        Returns:
        True, if the player has the sufficient mana to use spell given as parameter.

      • LevelUp

        public void LevelUp()
        Levelup function, just increments stats by using formula of: 10 + level / 10, rounded downward also sets new maximum HP and mana and restores stats
